column1: #Text=Zuko says : " Close your eyes , and do n't peek . "
#Text=Zuko says : " Okay , now you can look . "
#Text=It 's a coupon for a free cup of tea .
#Text=" Jin says : " Lee , this is so sweet .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Do n't thank me – it was my uncle 's idea .
#Text=He thinks you 're our most valuable customer .
#Text=" Jin says : " Your uncle is a good teacher .
#Text=Now it 's your turn to close your eyes .
